messages.title: THERE ARE AROUND 130 SEATS THAT THE CONSERVATIVES HAVEN'T WON
messages.content: ONLY THE BREXIT PARTY CAN BEAT CORBYN'S LABOUR - LEAVERS, DON'T WASTE YOUR VOTE

messages.title: WITHOUT THE BREXIT PARTY THERE CAN BE NO REAL BREXIT
messages.content: VOTE FOR THE BREXIT PARTY ON DECEMBER 12th

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Reform of the way we invest in public services.
A targeted approach to boosting jobs and the economy.
Political reforms including the abolition of the House of Lords.

mentions.tacticalSituation: There are around 130 seats that the Conservatives haven't won in at least 50 years. Only the Brexit Party can beat Corbyn's Labour.

issues.economy: Investing in public services and a targeted approach to boosting jobs and the economy.
issues.governance: Political reform including the abolition of the House of Lords.

images.caption: Candidate standing with watch indicating time for change.
